edu.mills.cs122.lab6

Class PageTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mills.cs122.lab6.PageTable

  • public class PageTable
extends java.lang.Object
    A high-level representation of a page table.
    Author:
    Ellen Spertus (spertus@mills.edu)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PageTable(int pageSize, int numPages, int numFrames, ReplacementScheme replacementScheme)
      Constructor for a simulated page table for the specified memory configuration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getNumAccesses()
      Returns the number of accesses (the number of calls to getPage(int)).
      int getNumMisses()
      Returns the number of misses (the number of calls to getPage(int) that caused a frame to be refilled).
      Page getPage(int pageNum)
      Reports that the specified page is being accessed.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PageTable

        public PageTable(int pageSize,
                 int numPages,
                 int numFrames,
                 ReplacementScheme replacementScheme)
        Constructor for a simulated page table for the specified memory configuration.
        Parameters:
        pageSize - number of byte addresses per page/frame
        numPages - number of pages in the logical address space
        numFrames - number of frames in the physical address space
        replacementScheme - scheme to decide which frame to replace when bringing in a page from secondary storage
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if pageSize is not a positive power of two or if any of the int arguments are not positive.

    • Method Detail

      • getPage

        public Page getPage(int pageNum)
        Reports that the specified page is being accessed. This increments the number of accesses and possibly the number of misses.
        Parameters:
        pageNum - the page to access
        Returns:
        the requested page

      • getNumAccesses

        public int getNumAccesses()
        Returns the number of accesses (the number of calls to getPage(int)).
        Returns:
        the number of accesses

      • getNumMisses

        public int getNumMisses()
        Returns the number of misses (the number of calls to getPage(int) that caused a frame to be refilled).
        Returns:
        the number of misses
